Shard of Mercurial Alacrity.name: Shard of Mercurial Alacrity
Shard of Mercurial Alacrity.description: +1 Bonus Action (max 3/turn) until end of next turn. Then +1 Exhaustion

Shard of Purification [Lesser].name: Shard of Purification [Lesser]
Shard of Purification [Lesser].description: Remove Berserk/Bleeding/Burning/Disoriented, OR +5 to next Condition removal roll

Shard of Rejuvenation.name: Shard of Rejuvenation
Shard of Rejuvenation.description: Ignore Stress/Exhaustion effects until end of next turn. -1 Stress, -1 Exhaustion

Shard of Unstoppable Might.name: Shard of Unstoppable Might
Shard of Unstoppable Might.description: +2 + Rep Level (min 1) to Physical damage until end of next turn. Then +1 Exhaustion

Shard of Purification [Potent].name: Shard of Purification [Potent]
Shard of Purification [Potent].description: Remove Drained/Distressed/Silenced/Soul-Siphoned (I-II), OR Advantage on next Condition removal roll

Shard of Tenacity.name: Shard of Tenacity
Shard of Tenacity.description: Gain Physical Resistance until end of next turn (applied before damage)

Shard of Magical Force.name: Shard of Magical Force
Shard of Magical Force.description: Advantage on next Attack. +Rep Level (min 1) to Attack and Damage

Shard of Solidarity.name: Shard of Solidarity
Shard of Solidarity.description: Gain 1 Unity Point (up to max) OR 1 Inspiration Point

Shard of Fate.name: Shard of Fate
Shard of Fate.description: Roll 2d20, keep highest. Use instead of Attack/Check/Resist roll (before rolling). Or expend as Inspiration. Unexpended die at Sleep Phase = Inspiration

Shard of Fortune.name: Shard of Fortune
Shard of Fortune.description: When squadron member rolls 1, change result to 15

Shard of Nepenthe.name: Shard of Nepenthe
Shard of Nepenthe.description: Remove 2 Trauma, heal 3d12 HP, restore 5d10 MP, -2 Exhaustion, -4 Stress, gain Inspiration

Shard of the Magi-Knight.name: Shard of the Magi-Knight
Shard of the Magi-Knight.description: Full restore HP/MP, remove all Stress/Exhaustion, +2 Unity (up to max), +1 Inspiration, Purge all Conditions, heal 6 Crystalline Fractures
